synopsis.text: Englishman Simon Wright has just moved into a new house with his family, but when they mysteriously vanish, he seeks help from the Layton Detective Agency. The agency is run by none other than Katrielle Layton, the daughter of the famous archaeology professor, Hershel Layton, who has gone missing himself. Katrielle, determined to find her father, opens the agency to solve unusual mysteries and gather clues to his whereabouts. With the help of her talking dog, Sherl, and her assistant Noah Montoir, Katrielle takes on cases involving cursed houses, demon-cursed dresses, and even zombies. As she navigates the beautiful streets of London on her bicycle, Katrielle uncovers a conspiracy of millionaires and closes in on the biggest mystery of her life: the disappearance of her father. Join Katrielle and her team as they solve puzzles, mysteries, and bring humor to every case in this all-new adventure from the successful gaming franchise, Layton Series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
